thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: No grumbles - would stay again
thread.title_full: No grumbles - would stay again - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Robert J
title: No grumbles - would stay again
text:
Great hotel choice for our visit to Rome. Rooms clean , fresh & comfy. When we arrived our booking agent had cancelled our booking. Despite this the reception staff sorted out a room for us & the hotel manager saw us the next day & reassured us she wold fix it, she did. (cancellation due to agents technical fault) All staff extremely helpful & friendly. Good bar prices too.
Nice restaurant nearby called Nerone . Our custom was appreciated with Lemocello on the house.
